content.query:
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
    FROM
        OPENROWSET(
            BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@nyctaxistorageadls2.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
            FORMAT = 'CSV',
            PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
            HEADER_ROW=TRUE
        )
        with (LocationID  SMALLINT,
            Borough VARCHAR(100),
            Zone VARCHAR(100),
            service_zone VARCHAR(100)
            ) AS result
